00008 #if !defined(Auxiliary_BitField_hpp)
00009 #define Auxiliary_BitField_hpp
00010 
00011 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00012 #include <Auxiliary/Macros.hpp>
00013 
00016 template <class T> class BitField {
00017     public:
00018         enum { NrOfBits = sizeof(T) * 8 };
00019 
00021         BitField(const T& bit_field = 0) : m_bit_field(bit_field) {};
00022 
00024         BitField& operator <<(INT shift_pos) {
00025             ASSERT_DEBUG(shift_pos >= 0 && shift_pos < NrOfBits);
00026             m_bit_field = m_bit_field << shift_pos;
00027             return (*this);
00028         }
00029 
00031         BitField& operator >>(INT n_shifts) {
00032             ASSERT_DEBUG(n_shifts >= 0 && n_shifts < NrOfBits);
00033             m_bit_field = m_bit_field >> n_shifts;
00034             return (*this);
00035         }
00036 
00038         BOOLEAN operator == (const BitField &bit_field) const { 
00039             return (m_bit_field == bit_field.m_bit_field); 
00040         }
00041 
00043         void Set(T bit_field, T mask) {
00044             m_bit_field = (m_bit_field & ~mask) | (bit_field & mask);
00045         }
00046 
00048         void Set(T bit_field) {
00049             m_bit_field = bit_field;
00050         }
00051 
00054         void SetBit(INT bit_index, BOOLEAN set) {
00055             if (set) {
00056                 m_bit_field |= BitMask(bit_index);
00057             } // if
00058             else {
00059                 m_bit_field &= ~BitMask(bit_index);
00060             } // else
00061         };
00063         void SetBit(INT bit_index) {
00064             m_bit_field |= BitMask(bit_index);
00065         };
00066 
00068         void SetTrue(INT bit_index) {
00069             m_bit_field |= BitMask(bit_index);
00070         };
00071 
00073         void SetFalse(INT bit_index) {
00074             m_bit_field &= ~BitMask(bit_index);
00075         };
00076 
00078         void Clear() { m_bit_field = 0; }
00079 
00081         INT GetNrOfBits() const { return (NrOfBits); }
00082 
00084         T Get(const T &mask) const { return (m_bit_field & mask); }
00085 
00087         T Get() const { return (m_bit_field); }
00088 
00090         BOOLEAN GetBit(INT bit_index) const { return ((m_bit_field & BitMask(bit_index)) != 0); };
00091 
00094         BOOLEAN IsSet(const T &bit_field) const { return ((~(m_bit_field | ~bit_field)) == 0); };
00095 
00096 
00098         T Mask(const T &mask) const { return (m_bit_field & mask); };
00099 
00101         BOOLEAN IsEqual(const T &bit_field, const T &mask) const {
00102             return ((bit_field & mask) == Get(mask));
00103         };
00104 
00106         BOOLEAN IsEqual(const BitField<T> &bit_field) const {
00107             return (m_bit_field == bit_field.m_bit_field);
00108         };
00109 
00110     private:
00111         T m_bit_field;
00112 
00113         T BitMask(INT bit_index) const {
00114             ASSERT_DEBUG(bit_index >= 0 && bit_index < NrOfBits);
00115             return (T(1) << bit_index);
00116         }
00117 
00118 };
00119 
00120 typedef BitField<UINT8>  BitField8;
00121 typedef BitField<UINT16> BitField16;
00122 typedef BitField<UINT32> BitField32;
00123 
00124 
00125
